      • connect

        void connect(java.lang.String username,
             java.lang.String password)
      throws DatabaseException,
             ConnectionFailedException
        Connects the user to the application and loads his projects.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user
        password - password of the user
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - if a problem occurs while fetching the user's projects.
        ConnectionFailedException - If the connection to the database fails

      • register

        void register(User newUser)
       throws DatabaseException,
              ConnectionFailedException
        Register a new user to the application.
        Parameters:
        newUser - the user to register
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - This exception is thrown to let the user know that there is a database failure
        ConnectionFailedException - If the connection to the database fails
